sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. In a large bowl, combine shredded green papaya, shredded carrots, halved cherry tomatoes, chopped green beans, and crushed peanuts. 2. In a small bowl, whisk together minced Thai bird's eye chili, minced garlic, lime juice, fish sauce, and brown sugar to make the dressing. 3. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. 4. Serve immediately.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Green Papaya (1, shredded), Carrots (1, </ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Thai Green Papaya Salad</name> <nutrition>Calories: 250, Protein: 5g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 30g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Shred green papaya and carrots. 2. Chop green beans. 3. Halve cherry tomatoes. 4. Crush peanuts.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>3491d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afea</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
